resources.string: It is particularly ‘cool’ to be seen flaunting a grocery bag from convenience store 7-Eleven, which seems to be a popular brand among plastic bag fans.
Men and women alike are thrilled with their latest garment, although the transparent bags leave absolutely nothing to the imagination.
People are stripping naked and posting photos of themselves wearing nothing but a plastic bag. So, would you try???
A new bizarre fashion trend suggests you may have been overlooking the ultimate clothing item, despite unwittingly bringing it home with you after every shopping trip.
